com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx

Class DNXProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.exlibris.digitool.common.dnx.DNXProfile

  • public class DNXProfile
extends java.lang.Object
    DNXProfile defines the behavior of the DNX document
    Version:
    1.0

    DNXProfile defines the behavior of the DNX document in terms of:
    1) Attributes of each DNX section
    2) Mapping of DNX values from/to PREMIS objects or TechnicalMetadata objects (not implemented yet)

    The DNX section contains:
    1) the section description
    2) the section PREMIS object type association (relevant for IE, REP or FILE)
    3) the section METS association (TECHMD, DIGIPROVMD , RIGHTSMD or SOURCEMD)
    4) list of mandatory sections
    5) repeatable section or not (if yes, the representative key for display)
    5) list of valid keys per section

    For each key, the profile holds the following attributes:
    1) description
    2) data type (STRING, INTEGER, DATETIME, BOOLEAN, or CONTROL_LIST)
    3) mandatory or not

    Author:
    Tsachm

      • getSectionKeyControlListName

        public java.lang.String getSectionKeyControlListName(java.lang.String sectionId,
                                                     java.lang.String sectionKeyId)
        Returns the section's "type" attribute. The value represents the name of the code table controlling the list of valid values.
        Parameters:
        sectionId - the section identifier
        sectionKeyId - the section key identifier
        Returns:
        code table name holding the list of valid values

      • getSectionKeyType

        public DNXProfile.SectionKeyType getSectionKeyType(java.lang.String sectionId,
                                                   java.lang.String sectionKeyId)
        Returns the section's "type" attribute as an enumeration of STRING, INTEGER, DATETIME, BOOLEAN, CONTROLLEDLIST and POPULATOR In case the value in the file is empty returns STRING. In case the value in the file does't match any of the enum types also returns STRING and write to log.
        Parameters:
        sectionId - the section identifier
        sectionKeyId - the section key identifier
        Returns:
        the key type (STRING, INTEGER, DATETIME, BOOLEAN, CONTROLLEDLIST, POPULATOR)
